name: Don't Go To Law School
description:
Ever wondered what a corporate lawyer's day looks like, or why they're so miserable and cranky all the time?

Wonder no more. This ultrashort CYOA takes you through a day in the life of a mid-level corporate lawyer in Hong Kong. Can you balance work and family appropriately, or will you end up a bitter, broken Of Counsel failure?

Created in 6 days for My First Game Jam, mainly to try out using Godot. It should run OK but don't expect much game. Bugs will be fixed at some point, maybe. 

Any enjoyment derived from running this is your own responsibility; no warranties or indemnities are given as to entertainment value, fun or other legal fictions.

Lawyers, law firms and clients referenced herein are all fictional and in no way resemble any specifically identifiable person.
